name: Crazy Dino
description:
Crazy Dino is an 2d endless runner game by As Dev.The objective of this game is to just go ahead more and more...!!!

Beta Version

This Game is in currently In beta version and may contain some bugs,if you find any bugs then contact us on help.asdev@gmail.com...Thanks!
